about.details:
Incorporated in 2015, Sheetal Universal Limited sources, processes, and supplies agricultural raw materials such as peanuts, sesame seeds, spices, and grains for the production of peanut butter, cookies, cakes, chocolate, and food products.

Sheetal Universal's product category includes:

  • Oilseeds: Peanuts, Groundnut Inshell, Hulled Sesame Seeds
  • Spices: Fenugreek seeds, Cumin Seeds, Turmeric, Dill Seeds, Kalunji, Fennel Seeds
  • Grains: Rice, Chickpeas
  • Other products: Raisins, Desiccated Coconut

The company's manufacturing and processing facility is located in Jamnagar, Gujrat, and is spread over a total area of approximately 14668 sq. mtr.

Sheetal Universal has two subsidiaries, namely Saumesvar International Private Limited, which exports agricultural produce, ceramic tiles, and brass fittings from India, and Svar Industries Private Limited, which produces, processes, and distributes agricultural produce, seeds, agricultural seeds, forestry seeds, vegetable seeds, cereals, grains, pulses, cattle feed or cakes and spices, including raw spices.

faqs.question: What is the Sheetal Universal IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sheetal Universal IPO is a SME IPO of 3400000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹23.80 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹70 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on December 4, 2023, and closes on December 6, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sheetal Universal IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sheetal Universal IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sheetal Universal IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sheetal Universal IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sheetal Universal IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sheetal Universal IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sheetal Universal IPO opens on December 4, 2023 and closes on December 6, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sheetal Universal IPO?
faqs.answer: Sheetal Universal IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,40,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sheetal Universal IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sheetal Universal IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Sheetal Universal IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Sheetal Universal IPO will be done on Thursday, December 7, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, December 8, 2023. Check the Sheetal Universal IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Sheetal Universal IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Sheetal Universal IPO listing date is on Monday, December 11, 2023.
